item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Tazza!!!!! 

If you missed the last time we went in April, then this is your chance to enjoy it again, and for those that haven't been yet - its been renovated! You won't recognize it - but its as hip, trendy and low key as it ever was, and as its always been of course! Great drinks, great food and great places to gather inside, an evening at Tazza is always a good one!

This is also the place that hosts Movies on the Block every Thursday night at dusk through trough the end of September - so its not too late to try it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a scarf if its cool and a silver flower if its not, but I'll be near the bar or outside.
item.name: Monday Night Meeup - Tazza!!!!!
